For Line 2, ensure it has a positive slope of 45 degrees, forming a 2:1 ratio with Line 1 and Line 3. Line 4 is parallel to the X-axis and closes the loop. Scale the 2D sketch Scale the entire 2D sketch by a factor of 0.75 from the lower-left corner (0, 0). Transform the 2D sketch into 3D Transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch by applying a rotation of -90 degrees around the X-axis (euler_angles[0]) and a translation of [0.0, 0.5, 0.0] (translation\\_vector). Extrude the 3D model Extrude the 3D sketch to obtain a solid model with the following properties: * Extrude depth towards the normal: 0.5 units * Extrude depth opposite normal: 0.0 units * Sketch scale: 0.75 * Operation: Create a new solid body **Part 2 Instructions** Create the coordinate system Create a new coordinate system for this part with the following properties: * Euler angles: [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] * Translation vector: [0.0, 0.0, 0.25] Draw the 2D sketch Draw a 2D sketch on the XY plane of the newly created coordinate system. For Face 2, make sure Line 1 has a positive slope and Line 2 is parallel to the X-axis. Scale the 2D sketch Scale the entire 2D sketch by a factor of 0.75 from the lower-left corner (0, 0). Extrude the 3D model Extrude the 3D sketch to obtain a solid model with the following properties: * Extrude depth towards the normal: 0.25 units * Extrude depth opposite normal: 0.0 units * Sketch scale: 0.75 * Operation: Join the solid body with the existing solid body from part 1 After completing both parts, you should see a final shape that resembles two intersecting rectangular prisms, with the prism from part 2 intersecting the top part of the prism from part 1. The overall shape has a width, length, and height of approximately 1:1:0.5.</description>

Part 1 - Sketch - Other Faces Face\\_2, face\\_3, and face\\_4 are symmetrical to face\\_1, with the same dimensions and locations. Part 1 - Extrusion Extrude the sketch along the normal direction with the following properties: * Extrude depth towards the normal: 0.0443 * Extrude depth opposite normal: 0.0 * Sketch scale: 0.75 * Operation: Create a new body This concludes the instructions for constructing the rectangular prism, which has the following dimensions: * Height: 0.75 (same as side length) * Width: 0.0443 * Length: 0.75</description>
